description.value:
Your study of the moon allows you to learn spells that bring light to the darkness. You can prepare these spells when you are the appropriate Bard level.

College of the Moon Spells
Spell LevelSpells
1st@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDivineFavo]{Divine Favor}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGuidingBol]{Guiding Bolt}
2nd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBlur000000]{Blur}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplVortexWarp]{Vortex Warp}
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCrusadersM]{Crusader's Mantle}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplPulseWave0]{Pulse Wave}
4th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplResilientS]{Resilient Sphere}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSecretChes]{Secret Chest}
5th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplArcaneHand]{Arcane Hand}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplHallow0000]{Hallow}
